messages.content:
Analyze this repository to identify build system manifests. Respond with JSON ONLY.

Repository: bazel-build
File tree summary:
Root files: BUILD, WORKSPACE, main.cc, universalbuild.json
Extensions: {"cc": 1, "json": 1}

Identify manifest files and their build systems. Return JSON array ONLY.
CRITICAL: Exclude lockfiles (package-lock.json, Cargo.lock, yarn.lock, etc), logs, and output directories.

[
  {
    "manifest_path": "build.zig",
    "build_system": "zig",
    "language": "Zig",
    "confidence": 0.85
  }
]
